name: Mixed Puzzle
description:
Mixed Puzzle - a puzzle known and loved amond children and adults. While being convenient on the go it's also a perfrect trainer for your brain! Each time when you start a new game the chips are drawn in random order. The player is supposed to not only complete the puzzle, but also spend the least number of moves and time on making the moves.

Features of our application:
- the possibility to play not only Photo Puzzle but also the Classic mode , Rotate mode and Mixed Mode
- 144 colorful photos are divided into 12 themes: nature, children, space, auto, cities, textures, dogs, cats, motorbikes, cartoons, food, New Year
- the possibility to download any own photo!
- "Hint" function
- You can share the complete picture on Facebook and Twitter!!!

Mixed Puzzle - a game with which you won't get bored!
